attributes.action: Fine the big media outlets for causing a mass panic regarding fuel
attributes.additional_details: Because they have the power to do it and it’s affected the people of this country
attributes.background: Fine the big media outlets with big amounts of money which would hold them responsible and will force them to think before broadcasting that in future could cause panic for no reason

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
